properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Low in the grave He lay— Jesus my Savior! Waiting the coming day— Jesus my Lord!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Up from the grave He arose, With a mighty triumph o’er His foes He arose a Victor from the dark domain, And He lives forever with His saints to reign. He arose! He arose! Hallelujah! Christ arose!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Vainly they watch His bed— Jesus, my Savior! Vainly they seal the dead— Jesus my Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Death cannot keep his prey— Jesus, my Savior! He tore the bars away— Jesus my Lord!
